languages.text: "Служба Империуму стоит превыше личных пожеланий. Тем более столь... приземленных, как твои, Джай".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Мы не на рынке, а на службе Империума, Джай. Напоминаю... на всякий случай".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."
languages.original_text: "Служба Империуму стоит превыше личных пожеланий. Тем более столь... приземленных, как твои, Джай".

traits.locale_text: "Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."
"Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."
"Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."
"Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."
"Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."
"Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."

languages.text: "Jeder Dienst am Imperium ist mehr wert als die Befriedigung persönlicher Wünsche, insbesondere eines so ... würdelosen wie dem Euren, Jae."
languages.original_text: "Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Dienst am Imperium ist mehr wert als die Befriedigung persönlicher Wünsche, insbesondere eines so ... würdelosen wie dem Euren, Jae."

languages.text: « Notre devoir envers l'Imperium passe avant la satisfaction personnelle, surtout lorsqu'elle s'exprime sous la forme d'un désir aussi... indigne que le vôtre, Jae. »
languages.original_text: "Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."

traits.locale_text: « Notre devoir envers l'Imperium passe avant la satisfaction personnelle, surtout lorsqu'elle s'exprime sous la forme d'un désir aussi... indigne que le vôtre, Jae. »

languages.text: “侍奉帝国比满足一切个人欲望都更有价值，尤其是对你这样……不体面的人而言，婕伊。”
languages.original_text: "Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."

traits.locale_text: “侍奉帝国比满足一切个人欲望都更有价值，尤其是对你这样……不体面的人而言，婕伊。”

languages.text: «Servir al Imperium vale más que satisfacer ningún deseo personal. Especialmente uno tan... poco digno como el suyo, Jae».
languages.original_text: "Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."

traits.locale_text: «Servir al Imperium vale más que satisfacer ningún deseo personal. Especialmente uno tan... poco digno como el suyo, Jae».

languages.text: 「個人的な欲望を満たすことよりも、帝国に奉仕することのほうが価値がある。特に、あなたのような…品位に欠ける欲望ならなおさらだ、ジェイ」
languages.original_text: "Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."

traits.locale_text: 「個人的な欲望を満たすことよりも、帝国に奉仕することのほうが価値がある。特に、あなたのような…品位に欠ける欲望ならなおさらだ、ジェイ」

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'a hizmet, herhangi bir şahsi arzuyu tatmin etmekten daha kıymetlidir. Özellikle de seninki gibi... İtibarsız bir arzuyu Jae."
languages.original_text: "Doing the Imperium a service is worth more than satisfying any personal desire — especially one as... undignified as yours, Jae."
